name: video-metadata-extractor
title: Video Metadata Extractor
description: Extract comprehensive metadata from video files including duration, resolution, codec information
content:
Overview

This application extracts comprehensive metadata from video files including duration, resolution, frame rate, codec information, and more. Built using OpenCV, it provides detailed technical information about video files in both human-readable format and JSON.

Features

  • Extract file size, duration, and resolution
  • Get frame rate and total frame count
  • Identify video codec (FourCC)
  • Calculate aspect ratio and bitrate
  • Export metadata as JSON file

Parameters

  • Input Video: Upload your video file from stash
  • Save JSON: Option to save metadata as JSON file
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output (if saving JSON)

Output

The application displays metadata in the console and optionally saves it as a JSON file (e.g., video_metadata.json) containing all extracted properties.

Metadata Includes

  • Filename and file size
  • Duration (seconds and formatted)
  • Resolution (width x height)
  • Aspect ratio
  • Frame rate (fps)
  • Total frame count
  • Codec identifier (FourCC)
  • Bitrate (if available)

Use Cases

  • Video file analysis and cataloging
  • Quality control and validation
  • Batch processing preparation
  • Content management systems
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python "prod_apps/python/video_metadata_extractor.py" "${videoFile}" -o "${outputDir}" ${saveJson:+--json}
